arts.ttl: England player ratings: verdict on 3-0 Nations League win against Greece
arts.athr: Jacob Steinberg at the Olympiako Stadio Spyros Louis
arts.sum: Curtis Jones and Noni Madueke kickstarted their fledgling international careers with eye-catching performances Jordan Pickford (GK): Preserved England’s lead with fine saves from Kostas Tsimikas and Fotas Ioannidis. Booked for time-wasting by an officious referee. 8/10 Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Investigation launched as England fans hit by ‘tear gas’ from Greek police: ‘They treat us like animals’
arts.sum: 3,500 travelling England supporters attended the Nations League clash at the sold-out Olympic Stadium in Athens

arts.ttl: Arsenal news: Gunners duo defended in Harry Kane row as Mikel Arteta suffers transfer blow
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta is hoping to use the November international break to regroup his Arsenal squad following a bruising start to the Premier League season, with their title hopes faltering

arts.ttl: England show they are ready to take next step, but where's Thomas Tuchel?
arts.sum: With England's 3-0 over Greece in the UEFA Nations League, incoming manager Thomas Tuchel will have a lot to work with heading into next year.

arts.ttl: Carsley backs benched Kane to bounce back
arts.sum: England interim boss Lee Carsley has backed Harry Kane to respond to being dropped against Greece by confirming he will start in Sunday's UEFA Nations League clash against Republic of Ireland at Wembley.

arts.ttl: England fans tear gassed at Greece match as FA investigate heavy-handed police tactics
arts.sum: England supporters have reported being tear gassed and kettled by Greek riot police while trying to get into the Olympic Stadium in Athens to watch their Nations League match

arts.ttl: Lee Carsley proud of England’s control in crucial Nations League win over Greece
arts.sum: England are now in control of the group.

arts.ttl: How I played for England after having a stroke
arts.sum: Footballers Matt Crossen and Aaron Lucas speak to BBC Sport about representing England at the Cerebral Palsy World Cup in Spain.

arts.ttl: Lee Carsley reveals reason behind Harry Kane's omission for England's UEFA Nations League win over Greece
arts.sum: England interim boss Lee Carsley reveals the reason behind his decision to select Ollie Watkins over Harry Kane for the 3-0 win over Greece in the UEFA Nations League.

arts.ttl: 'A night of redemption for Carsley offers real hope for Tuchel'
arts.sum: England interim manager Lee Carsley's finest in charge send positive message to incoming coach Thomas Tuchel
